Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was quite a snow statue.
It's a shame that it's only displayed
during the Festival.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Of all things, a pot full of
*that* being served....
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Hm? Oh I'm just talking to myself.
Don't worry about it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was a lot of fun, huh.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...What?
Your hand is red, <MYNAME>.
You cold?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hey, give me your hand.
I'll hold it for you.
That's warmer, isn't it?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad I got to spend the day with you
at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Acting like kids, playing in the snow...
This is kind of nice.
<PAGE>
As long as it's with you, <MYNAME>
I want to come again next year.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a heck of a snow statue. Do you
want to try making something together,
unrelated to the Festival?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I bet we could put together
something pretty cool, with my sense
and your ability, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm not really hungry...
Couldn't eat much of that stew, either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Could you make something light for me
before dinner when we get home, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
If it's something that you made
especially for me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll eat it all up,
even if I'm not feeling good.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even for just one snow statue,
the creator's sense makes a difference.
<PAGE>
Even for the simplest snowman we have
to choose colors for gloves and hats,
what we should use for the eyes....
<PAGE>
Every detail makes a difference. It's
all in the details. You can really
see what the artist pays attention to.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Other than the size,
today's snow statue wasn't bad.
Keep up the good work.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I like making snow statues, but being a
stylist, my hands are important. I'm 
not sure if I could do this every year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But that depends on
who's participating in the Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If one of my friends
was trying to make something,
I'd help them out.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Snow Festival was fun!
I thought I would freeze when we joined,
but now I'm nice and warm!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The stew was great!
I just had to eat more of it.
It really warmed me up!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was really fun!
...Oh hey, <MYNAME>,
your hands are so red. Are you cold?
<PAGE>
Hmm... Oh, yeah! That's it.
Let me see your hands.
<PAGE>
My body temperature is warm,
so if we hold hands like this,
it might help you a little!
<PAGE>
...What do you think?
Is it a bit better?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad I got to spend time with you
at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's fun to act like children
sometimes, playing in snow and all.
We should come again next year♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had fun
eating stew with everybody.
<PAGE>
But I think
your stew is the best, <MYNAME>.
It's definitely my favorite.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hey, can you make some soon?
I can't wait!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was really well made!
Oh yeah! Let's try making something
together, unrelated to the Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>With my strength and your 
ability, <MYNAME>, I bet
we can make something great♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Ah-CHOO!
Gosh it's cold....
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I had a snowball fight during
Snow Festival, and my clothes got messy.
<PAGE>
I'm going to catch a cold like this!
I need to get in the bath
at home as soon as possible!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't it hard 
to make snow statues?
<PAGE>
I just remembered, when I was a kid
I wanted to make a giant snowman,
and I tried very hard....
<PAGE>
As the snowball got bigger,
it got too heavy to roll.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So I tried to force it to roll,
and I almost got squashed by it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I couldn't finish it that time,
but maybe I can this time?
I'm going to give it a shot!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone, young and old,
was having fun in the snow.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh? You don't think
I was having that much fun?
Nonsense, nonsense.
<PAGE>
Maybe not as much as the kids,
but I had a good time.
This sort of thing is fun sometimes.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone gathered around the giant pot,
eating stew together... That was fun.
<PAGE>
Around the pot is the place to be with
a bunch of friends, in the cold winter.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was great.
...Whoa! <MYNAME>, your hands
are all red... Are you cold?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hmmm...Let me think.
Ok, lend me your hands.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If we hold hands like this,
it's warmer, isn't it? If you don't
mind, want to go home like this?
<PAGE>
You don't have to hold back.
Or are you embarrassed?
Haha, you are so shy.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad I got to spend time with you
at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's fun to act like kids
sometimes, playing with snow and all.
We should come again next year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nice to eat stew
with everyone there.
<PAGE>
I think I prefer
the stew that you make,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you don't mind, <MYNAME>,
please cook some stew for me next time.
I'll look forward to it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That snow statue went well. Next time,
it may be nice to make something
together outside of the Festival.
<PAGE>
With my experience with all the snow
statues I've seen, and your ability,
<MYNAME>, we could make something great.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Kids are so energetic,
even in this cold weather.
<PAGE>
During the Snow Festival, I heard kids
talking about snow fighting, rabbits.
Kids are energetic, even in the cold.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The theme for the snow statue is
decided by Dunhill...
<PAGE>
The number of people participating makes
a difference. I wonder if he just
decides when he sees how many there are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>His talent and passion to
lead the town and the festival
are amazing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's Snow Festival was so
full of life and fun.
The snow statue was excellent, too.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so nice to eat stew
under the cold sky.
<PAGE>
It was so delicious that
I couldn't stop eating.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was quite a delight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Oh, <MYNAME>.
Your hands are all red.
Are you cold?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you don't mind, let me see your
hands...See, if we hold hands like this,
we can stay a bit warmer, right?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was an honor
to spend the day with you
at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Romping around like children
in the snow
was a lovely experience.
<PAGE>
I hope that we are able to
come again next year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That snow statue went well.
<PAGE>
Next time, it may be nice to
make something together 
outside of the Festival.
<PAGE>
With my knowledge and your 
ability, <MYNAME>,
We could make something great.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I enjoyed eating stew alongside
everyone. It was delicious.
<PAGE>
But, as for myself,
I prefer the stew that you make,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Um...If you don't mind
Can you cook some stew for me
sometime soon?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Talking about it
makes me want to 
eat your stew.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The snow statue we made
is starting to melt
probably because we put it near the pot.
<PAGE>
By the time the festival is cleaned up,
even its remains will have
melted away.
<PAGE>
The thought makes me feel lonely.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Even with a normal stew,
it takes a long time for the
vegetables to get soft....
<PAGE>
It's hard to imagine what it was like
to cook such an amount with the huge pot
It must have been quite the chore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But, because of that,
we were able to indulge in
some delicious stew.
<PAGE>
The cooks deserve
our highest thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the beginning
I wasn't in the mood for a festival
in such a cold weather.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But now that I'm here,
I realize that this isn't so bad.
Curious.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The stew at the end
really warmed me up.
...It might have been a little TOO hot.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was a lot of fun.
...Hey, <MYNAME>?
Your hands are really red.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>What the!? They're freezing!
You should wear gloves!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Geez.
Guess I have no choice.
I'll just hold your hands for a while.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>My body temperature is rather warm,
so you should stay warm while I hold
your hands....Hey, quit smiling.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was fun hanging out with you
at the Snow Festival today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Eh, every now and then
it's fun to play in the snow
like a kid.
<PAGE>
I could do without the Festival,
but if I get to spend it with you,
I'd like to come again next year, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was quite good. Next
time it might be nice to make something
together outside of the Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>With my stamina and
your ability, <MYNAME>, we can make
something really cool.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eating stew with everyone was 
pretty good, I guess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I prefer
your stew, though,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Aw, talking about this
is making me want to eat some.
<PAGE>
I'm all full today, but
you should definitely
make some for me soon.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was thinking,
while I was eating this stew....
<PAGE>
I think stew is awesome.
Even if you hate veggies,
they're fine when they're in a stew.
<PAGE>
Whoever invented stew
is awesome.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...I'm not saying
that I hate veggies.
Don't misunderstand me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Making snow statues
is hard work.
<PAGE>
I'm not good at shapes, or decorating.
I'm impressed by those who can.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The build quality of the snow statue
was quite nice.
<PAGE>
The stew was really delicious, too...
I would love to take part next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Next year it would be nice if we could
make an even better snow statue.
<PAGE>
I'm especially counting
on your techniques, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was really fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Oh? <MYNAME>,
It appears that your hands are red...
Are you cold?
<PAGE>
Hmmm...Yes.
Show me your hands, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>My body temperature is not
really all that warm, so it might
not have much of an effect, but....
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If we hold hands like this,
perhaps you will feel better.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am extremely glad
that I was able to spend time
with you at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's fun to act like kids
sometimes, playing in the snow and all.
<PAGE>
I do hope that we
are able to come again next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was quite nice.
<PAGE>
It might be nice to make something
outside of the festival
next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>With my knowledge, and
your ability, <MYNAME>, we could
make something great.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Eating stew with everyone
was truly delicious.
<PAGE>
However, 
I prefer your stew,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, could you make some stew
for me next time?
I'll look forward to it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Depending on the region, there are
some countries where it doesn't
snow. Thinking about that...
<PAGE>
It's really nice that
we are able to have fun with
natural snow like this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The thing that makes this city's
Snow Festival stand out is the
huge pot full of stew.
<PAGE>
We're really privileged
to be able to eat hot stew
around the pot like this.
<PAGE>
It must be a huge job every year
to prepare for it,
but I really hope they keep it up.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a fantastic snow statue!
I took some
outstanding photos♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was fun!
It ended all too soon.
I wanted to talk more with everyone.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Snow Festival was really fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But my hands and ears are so cold
that they're starting to hurt...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That's it!
Hey, <MYNAME>.
Give me your hands!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah, that's so warm <RED>∀</RED>
You're a living hand warmer, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was nice to be with you today
at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's fun to act like kids
and play around in the snow
sometimes.
<PAGE>
I hope we can come again next year,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a great snow statue!
Next time we should make something
outside of the Festival.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>With my strength from delivering
newspapers, and your ability, <MYNAME>,
we can make something great.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
For some reason, I'm not really hungry.
I couldn't eat much of the stew.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When we get back home
can you make some snacks, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The snacks you make are so delicious,
<MYNAME>,
I bet they'll revive my lost appetite!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's exciting to know what the snow
statue for the Festival is going to be!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I wonder what it's going to
be next year. I hope it's a big cake!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If it is, I'll
try really hard
to make the best snow statue!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Come to think of it, why is it that the
meal inside the pot is always stew?
<PAGE>
If they're trying to warm us up,
curry or miso soup
would be good, wouldn't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hey! If their meal changed every year,
we'd have something else 
to be excited about!
<PAGE>
Don't you think so, <MYNAME>?
Okay! I'll go talk to Dunhill
and see what he thinks.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was beautiful.
It's so sad that it will
eventually melt and disappear.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I thought the stew was delicious.
It warmed me up
from the inside!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Snow Festival was very nice!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But my hands and ears got so cold,
they are a bit sore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know!
Um, <MYNAME>.
May I hold hands with you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Tee-hee-hee, that's warm <RED>∀</RED>
You're always warm, <MYNAME>!
I'm envious!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm happy I got to spend the day with
you at the Snow Festival, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's good to act like kids
sometimes, have fun in the snow.
How nice♪
<PAGE>
Tee-hee-hee, let's come again
next year.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was quite nice.
Hey, we should make something together
outside of the Festival next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>With my precise directions,
and your ability, <MYNAME>,
we could make something really great♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's nice to eat stew
with all these people.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But, I like
your stew better, 
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Um, <MYNAME>.
I want you to make
some delicious stew for me soon <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Oh, but don't make it
for at least a week.
I don't want to get tired of it♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow seems so fluffy, yet
its surprisingly heavy once collected.
<PAGE>
When I see someone holding a lot of
snow at once to build the
snow statue, I'm always impressed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Tee-hee-hee, you're nodding as if
I'm talking about someone else,
but it's about you, you know!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When we make snow statues,
you always carry an amazing
amount of snow.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's because of your hard work
at the farm.
I really respect you <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Snow Festival would be so romantic
if they held it at night.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...But it's so cold even during the day.
I think everyone would freeze
if they held it at night!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Snow Festival was fun...
It's amazing that it's possible... 
to make such statues with snow...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The stew in that huge pot...
was really delicious...
I'm so full... it hurts...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow festival was so much fun...
But...my hands and ears are so cold...
<PAGE>
Come to think of it...
Your hands aren't red at all, <MYNAME>...
...May I hold them a bit...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Warm...
<MYNAME>...you're so warm...
I'm so envious...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was...good to spend time with you...
at the Snow Festival... <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Sometimes...it's nice to have fun...
with snow... like kids...
Lets do it again next year...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow statue...it was quite nice...
Next time, outside of the Festival...
I want to make something together...
<PAGE>
I think if I could put clothes... on
snow statues that you created, <MYNAME>...
it would be nice... What do you think?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It tastes different...
Eating stew with all these people...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But... I prefer...
the stew you make... 
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Talking about it
really makes me want to eat some...
Will you make some... <MYNAME>...?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't mind detailed work...
I like making snow statues but....
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>The snow's so cold... my hands...
get really cold... handling it...
for so long...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That stew was... prepared by our
mothers...early in the morning....
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Waking up early and working hard...
for everyone...
is admirable....

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow statue for this year was
better than I imagined.
I was impressed.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whew...after eating the hot stew,
I'm a bit sweaty.
<PAGE>
I'll have to be careful not to
catch a cold, from the sweat being
cooled by the outside air.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow festival was very nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...But, my hands and ears are so cold
they're a bit sore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Wha-!? W-What is this?
Why are you holding my hands...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...ah, your hands
certainly are warm, <MYNAME>.
Um, that's why you did it...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>O-Oh, ok.
Thank you...Umm,
B-But...Er...I'm embarrassed.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a pleasure to spend the day
with you at the Snow Festival
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Playing in the snow, like kids... This
is a nice thing to do once in a while.
<PAGE>
I hope that we can come to the 
Snow Festival again next year, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The snow statue was quite nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Um, <MYNAME>. If you don't mind,
can we make something together,
outside of the Festival?
<PAGE>
With my delicate finger tips and
your ability, <MYNAME>, we could
make something lovely.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Eating stew together with everyone...
It's really delicious.
<PAGE>
However, I prefer
the stew that you make,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Talking about it makes me
want to eat your stew,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Um... if you don't mind,
could you please make some, soon?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was a kid, the first snow statue
that I made was a snow rabbit.
<PAGE>
It was small enough to fit in my hand.
It was barely even
a snow statue.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I showed it to my bro, who praised me. 
I was happy, I put it in the fridge.
But my mother scolded me for that.
<PAGE>
Tee-hee, good old memories.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't a festival to make snow statues
nice? Everyone from children to adults
are having fun. What a lovely festival.
<PAGE>
I'm already excited about what we're
going to make next year.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a really cute snow statue!
It's so sad that it's going to
melt so soon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish there was a freezer
big enough to hold the snow statue.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The stew,
it was so delicious!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, because it was so good
I ate it too fast
and burnt my tongue just a bit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Umm...it hurts...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The snow festival was so fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, my hands and ears are so cold
that they're getting sore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Hey, <MYNAME>!
I have a great idea!
Can you lend me your hands?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Tee-hee-hee,
just as I thought, your hands
are really warm <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
In fact, I want to hold your hands
forever, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad I got to spend time with you
at the Snow Festival today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's nice to act like children
sometimes,
rolling in the snow and all,
<PAGE>
Tee-hee-hee, I want to come again
with you next year.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a wonderful snow statue. It's fun
to participate in, and fun to just
watch, people making snow statues.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, I know, <MYNAME>!
We should make something together
outside of the Festival.
<PAGE>
With my motivation,
and your ability, <MYNAME>,
I bet we could make something great.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Eating stew all together
is really delicious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I
prefer your stew,
my name. It's better!
<PAGE>
In order to decide
between the two, would you please
make some stew for me soon?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...I'm just saying, tee-hee-hee.
Actually, I just want to eat stew
that you make for me, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Clement helped with the stew this year,
so it's different
from normal stew.
